department: Environment and Climate Change Canada / Parcs Canada
short_summary: stage 2 of a contract to build a new washroom and kiosk facility at Cape Breton Highlands National Park
description: To supply and install labour, services, materials, testing, and equipment to build a new washroom and kiosk facility at Cape Breton Highlands National Park in Nova Scotia
full_summary:
### Stage 2 - Cape Breton Highlands National Park - Ingonish Beach Washroom Facilities Replacement
####utherford English-French)
* **Reference Number**: cb-5635-92493759
* **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0040/A
* **Posting Date**: 2023-05-17
* **Casting Deadline**: 2023-05-24, 1400 hours ET
#### End of Tender Notice
_______________________________________________________________________________
### Brief Description
Parks Canada Agency is seeking a qualified contractor to provide all labour, services, materials, testing, and equipment for the construction of a new washroom and kiosk facility, as well as miscellaneous site work, services, and landscaping in Cape Breton Highlands National Park, near Ingonish, Nova Scotia.
### Important Dates
* **Contract Start Date**: None
* **Contract End Date**: None
### Contact Information
* **Name**: Sheldon Lalonde
* **Email**: [sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca](mailto:sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (343) 585-3836
* **Address**: 111 Water Street East, Cornwall, Ontario, K6H 6S2
### Canada Supply Service Cross-reference
* **Classification Code (UNSPSC)**: 72120000, Nonresidential Building Construction Services
* (Procurement Category)**: CNST (Construction and Specialized Services)
### Treaty Agreements and Geographical Accessibility
The undertaking is open only to firms holding a current Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) contract.
The undertaking is open to all Canadian-based firms
### Procedure
Bidding for this undertaking will follow a Two-Stage process:
* **First Stage**: Evaluation of Bidder Qualifications
* **Second Stage (Final Bid)**: Inviting qualified bidders for a financial bid on the project

Only the qualiied bidders will be invited for the final stage.
Every bidder is required to specify the excuses and variants along with sucker inclusion in Stage 2.
### Duration for the Completion of Works

The selected contractor will have up until March 31, 2024, to complete the construction of the Washroom and Kiosk facility and evacuation.
